EmailTemplate.name: MULTI ENGAGE | Top 5 reads of Q1
EmailTemplate.subject: Top 5 reads from Q1 of 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Catch up on what's happening on complianceweek.com with the top GRC reads from the first quarter of 2015:
Where Internal Audit Can Help in Cyber-Security (Feb 24) https://www.complianceweek.com/news/news-article/where-internal-audit-can-help-in-cyber-security#.VTaF5ZNRrd4
Six Compliance Events to Watch in 2015 (Jan 4) https://www.complianceweek.com/blogs/the-big-picture/six-compliance-events-to-watch-in-2015#.VTaF6pNRrd5
Dueling Thresholds Emerge on Going-Concern Warnings (Feb 18) https://www.complianceweek.com/news/news-article/dueling-thresholds-emerge-on-going-concern-warnings#.VTaF7JNRrd4
Preparing for Pay Rules, Privacy, and a New Congress (Jan 6) https://www.complianceweek.com/news/news-article/preparing-for-pay-rules-privacy-and-a-new-congress
Latest GRC Survey Shows Disconnect on Risk (Mar 3) https://www.complianceweek.com/blogs/accounting-auditing-update/latest-grc-survey-shows-disconnect-on-risk#.VTaF9JNRrd5
Thatâ€™s all for this update-- have a great week.
